snippet.title: [PC] Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb (2003) Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Title: Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb
Developer: The Collective, Inc.
Publisher: LucasArts
Release Date: March 25, 2003
Platform: PC
System specs: IBM ThinkPAD A31 (P-IV 1,8 GHz, 512 MB RAM, Mobility Radeon 7500 32 MB)
OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3

Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb is an action video game developed by The Collective and published by LucasArts in 2003 for the Xbox, Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 2 and OS X. It features cover art by Drew Struzan. The game is a new adventure of fictional archeologist Indiana Jones. The story takes place in 1935, just between the events of Indiana Jones and the Shrine of the Sea Devil and Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom, The tomb mentioned in the title is that of China's first Emperor Qin Shi Huang.

(from Wikipedia - http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indiana_Jones_and_the_Emperor%27s_Tomb)

The walkthrough of the game done on the "Normal" level of difficulty. There are some little sound desync during the video, sorry about that.

Enjoy and subscribe!

Level startpoints:


CEYLON:

01:04 - Gates of the Lost City
04:43 - The Hunter's Camp
14:24 - The Paths of the Ancients
21:19 - The Palace of Forgotten Kings
28:11 - River of Fangs
35:23 - Temple of the River Goddess
39:16 - Into the Sacred Caverns
46:07 - The Silent Guardians
49:55 - The Idol of Kouru Watu

PRAGUE:

57:25 - Introduction
1:01:51 - The Castle Gates
1:06:35 - The Dungeon
1:16:58 - The Courtyard
1:23:51 - The Great Hall
1:32:15 - The Library
1:39:00 - The Astrologer's Clock
1:40:51 - The Armory
1:47:16 - The Astrologer's Clock: Part 2
1:48:38 - The Observatory
1:57:15 - The Astrologer's Clock: Part 3
1:58:36 - Vega's Tower
2:05:09 - The Astrologer's Clock: Part 4
2:06:14 - The Laboratory

ISTANBUL:

2:11:04 - Istanbul Breakout
2:25:38 - The Secret of the Mosque: Part 1
2:34:10 - The Secret of the Mosque: Part 2
2:41:30 - The Sunken Palace
2:51:12 - The Gates of Neptune
3:11:19 - The Fall of the Sea King
3:16:37 - The Kraken's Lair

HONG KONG:

3:23:04 - The Golden Lotus Cinematic
3:24:41 - The Golden Lotus
3:33:08 - The Golden Lotus: Part 2
3:35:42 - The Streets of Hong Kong
3:38:10 - The Streets of Hong Kong: Part 2
3:40:18 - The Streets of Hong Kong: End

PENG LAI LAGOON

3:41:09 - Jade Wind
3:41:59 - The Secret of Peng Lai Lagoon: Part 1
3:49:27 - The Secret of Peng Lai Lagoon: Part 2
3:57:18 - Iron Cross
4:02:50 - The Meeting
4:04:22 - The U-Boat Base: Part 1
4:10:01 - The U-Boat Base: Part 2

PENG LAI MOUNTAINS

4:14:23 - The High Road to Peng Lai
4:18:23 - The Infiltration
4:27:46 - Terror at 2000 Feet
4:34:25 - The Airbase
4:42:31 - Ascent to Adventure

BLACK DRAGON FORTRESS:

4:49:10 - The Black Dragon Fortress
5:03:51 - Call to Battle
5:13:32 - The Tower of Storms
5:19:26 - The Rescue

TEMPLE OF KONG TIEN:

5:23:02 - Descent into Darkness
5:24:48 - The Catacombs
5:35:46 - The Dragon's Claw
5:44:07 - The Shadow of Kong Tien

THE EMPEROR'S TOMB:

5:51:21 - Rescue at Peng Lai
5:52:16 - Tomb of the First Emperor
5:56:45 - The Path of Unseen Peril
6:03:45 - The Bells of the Dead
6:08:04 - Von Beck's Revenge

THE NETHERWORLD

6:10:58 - The Pillars of the Underworld
6:16:45 - The Heart of the Dragon
6:21:45 - Rise of the Black Emperor

6:24:10 - EPILOGUE
